content.description:
Image 1

Raphael, Italian artist, Portrait of Pope Julius II, 1511

In the Public Domain

Image 2

Raphael, Italian artist, portrait of Heraclitus of Ephesus, an ancient Greek philosopher, part of a larger painting called The School of Athens, 1511

In the Public Domain
content.question: The commissioning of Image 1 best represents which of the following trends of the Italian Renaissance?

choices.label: The growing power of merchants and secular elites
The admiration for classical Greek and Roman works
The use of art to enhance the prestige of the elites
The use of print to disseminate religious ideas

content.answer: The use of art to enhance the prestige of the elites

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
